Powers -- Female Dwarf Medieval Seasoned Adventurer
Attributes (9 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes: Tough: +1 Vigor die
Skills (18 Points):
Academics: (sma) d6 Language (Dwarf): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d4
Athletics: (agi) d4 Language (Half-Elf): (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d6
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Survival: (sma) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Performance: (spi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d6
Healing: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Skill Notes: Outsider: -2 Persuasion (other races)
Size: 0
Advances: 7 Improvement Points: 18 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 8; Edge: 4; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (3 points): Arcane Background (Miracles); Fleet-Footed Hindrances: Doubting Thomas; Outsider; Secret; Stubborn Dwarf Features: Low Light Vision; Reduced Pace; Tough
Feature Notes:
Doubting Thomas: Overly skeptical of supernatural reality
Low Light Vision: Ignores penalties for dim and dark illumination
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Toughness: 9 (1) Parry: 5 (3) Cover: -4 Pace/Run: 7/+d6
Armor: Cloth Jacket Shield: Large Polymer Weapons: Crossbow: 1 (+0 d6 R15'); Heavy Crossbow: 1 (+0 2d8 R10'); Light Club: 1 (+0 d4+d6); Unarmed: 1 (+0 0+d6)
Combat Notes:
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run die
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run die
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP) R20 yd Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) to affect target for 5 rd
Banish: (3 PP) R20 yd Target suffers Shaken (Raise 1 Wound), incapacity returns to native plane (Spi neg)
Barrier: (2 PP) R20 yd Creates a 10 yd long by 2 yd high wall for 5 rd
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP) R20 yd Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min
Blast: (3 PP) R40 yd Medium blast inflicts 2d6 (Raise 3d6)
Blind: (2 PP) R20 yd Target suffers -2 on vision tasks (Raise -4) (Vigor removes 2 points)
Bolt: (1 PP) R40 yd Inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Boost/Lower Trait: (2 PP) R40 yd Target gains +1 Trait die (Raise +2) for 5 rd or target suffers -1 Trait die (Raise -2) (Spirit recovers 1 die)
Burrow: (2 PP) R20 yd Target can merge into earth for 5 rd
Burst: (2 PP) Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6)
Confusion: (1 PP) R20 yd Target suffers Distracted and Vulnerable for 1 rd (Sma neg)
Damage Field: (4 PP) R20 yd Creatures adjacent to target suffer 2d4 damage
Darksight: (1 PP) R20 Target ignores 4 points illumination penalties (Raise 6 pts) for 1 hr
Deflection: (3 PP) R20 yd Foes suffer -2 attacks(Raise -4) on target for 5 rd
Detect/Conceal Arcana: (2 PP) R20 yd Target can detect supernatural effects for 5 rd or conceals target aura for 1 hr
Disguise: (2 PP) R20 yd Target assumes another's appearance for 10 min
Dispel: (1 PP) R20 yd End targeted power (Arcane skill neg, +2 if types differ)
Divination: (5 PP) Self 1 min contact with otherworld force grants arcane skill roll to gain information
Drain Power Points: (2 PP) R20 yd Drains 1d6 PP (Raise adds drained PP to self) (Spi neg, +2 if types differ)
Elemental Manipulation: (1 PP) R20 yd Performs minor elemental manipulation for 5 rd
Empathy: (1 PP) R20 Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2) (Spi neg)
Entangle: (2 PP) R20 yd Restrains target until breaks free
Environmental Protection: (2 PP) R20 yd Target gains protection from hazards for 1 hr
Farsight: (2 PP) R20 yd Target sees up to 1 mile (Raise half Range penalties)
Fear: (2 PP) R20 yd Target extra flees, Wild Card suffers Fear Table (Fear save neg)
Fly: (3 PP) R20 yd Target gains 12 Fly for 5 rd
Growth/Shrink: (2/Size PP) R20 yd Target gains or loses Toughness and Strength die for 5 rd
Havoc: (2 PP) R20 yd Throws creatures in Medium Blast or Cone 2d6 x 2 yd (Str neg)
Healing: (3 PP) Touched recovers 1 Wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr
Illusion: (3 PP) R20 yd Creates 4 yd radius visual illusion for 5 rd
Intangibility: (5 PP) R20 yd Target becomes unaffected by physical world for 5 rd
Invisibility: (5 PP) R20 yd Target becomes invisible (foes -4 sight-based actions) for 5 rd
Light/Darkness: (2 PP) R20 yd Creates Large Blast bright light or darkness for 10 min
Mind Link: (1 PP) R20 yd Two targets communicate up to 1 mile telepathically (Raise 5 miles) for 30 min
Mind Reading: (2 PP) R20 yd Self gains 1 truthful answer from target (Sma neg)
Mind Wipe: (3 PP) R20 yd Target forgets up to 30 min event (Sma neg)
Object Reading: (2 PP) Self sees five yr of events that occurred w/in 10 yds of touched object (Raise 100 yr and 20 yd)
Protection: (1 PP) R20 yd Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Puppet: (3 PP) R20 yd Self controls target actions (Spi neg) for 5 rd
Relief: (1 PP) R20 yd Target recovers 1 Fatigue level (Raise 2 levels)
Resurrection: (30 PP) Successful -8 casting roll returns touched 1 yr corpse to life with 3 Wounds and Exhausted (Raise 0 Wounds)
Shape Change: (1 PP) Caster takes animal form for 5 rd
Sloth/Speed: (2 PP) R20 yd Target gains dbl Pace for 5 rd or suffers half pace (Spi ends)
Slumber: (2 PP) R20 yd Target sleeps for 1 hr (Spi neg)
Smite: (2 PP) R20 yd Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd
Sound/Silence: (1 PP) R100 yd Creates sound up to shout or R20 yd Mutes Large Blast Template for 5 rd
Speak Language: (1 PP) R20 yd Target speaks unknown language for 10 min
Stun: (2 PP) R20 yd Target stunned (Vig neg)
Summon Ally: (2 PP) R20 yd Creates obedient servant for 5 rd
Telekinesis: (3 PP) R40 yd Moves items remotely as Strength d10 (Raise d12) for 5 rd
Teleport: (2 PP) R20 yd Target teleports 24 yd (Raise 48 yd)
Wall Walker: (2 PP) R20 yd Target move at half Pace (Raise full Pace) on vertical and inverted surfaces for 5 rd
Warrior's Gift: (4 PP) R20 yd Target gains combat Edge effects for 5 rd
Zombie: (3 PP) R20 yd Animates and controls corpse for 1 hr
